'''v0.10.5 alpha''' is a minor update to ''[[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' released on January 11, 2015 for Android and on January 8, 2015 for Fire OS. It fixes some minor bugs in [[Pocket Edition v0.10.4 alpha|v0.10.4]].<ref>{{tweet|jbernhardsson|554677099366477824|Yeah, we have released a sneaky 0.10.5 version for Android that fixes some small stuff. Working on 0.11.0 now. :)|12 Jan 2015}}</ref> For Fire OS, this version includes changes from [[Pocket Edition v0.10.1 alpha|0.10.1]], [[Pocket Edition v0.10.2 alpha|0.10.2]], [[Pocket Edition v0.10.3 alpha|0.10.3]] and v0.10.4. This version was not released for iOS or Windows Phone. This is the first version released in 2015.
